DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Learning Complete Delayed Recognition Total Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the total score for the Hopkins Verbal Learning Test Revised delayed recognition.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to neurocognitive evaluation by the Hopkins Verbal Learning Test - Revised (HLVT-R) being done.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.
Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act, process, or experience of gaining knowledge or skill.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: The act, process, or experience of gaining knowledge or skill.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Hopkins Verbal Learning Test Revised Delayed Recognition Total Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the total score for the Hopkins Verbal Learning Test Revised delayed recognition (add up the number of UPPER CASE words answered with "Yes" and subtract from this value the number of lower case words answered with "Yes" with score range +12 to -12).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
